Applicant : Goodwin, Elaine
School (district) : Alturas Interational academy  (Forester 495)
Role(s) : Upper Elementary Teacher (3rd+);
LinkedIn Profile : 

INTERESTS
Why they want to be a part of this program:
	* My hope in entering this program is to increase my knowledge in STEM. This will allow me to incorporate more stem into my classroom and maybe even into our school. It was be so fun and beneficial for our students if I were able to start a stem club.
This applicant likes work environments that are:

	* In-Person
	* Remote
	* Hybrid

	* Secondary Email : Elaine.goodwin@alturasacademy.org
	* Phone : 2085341037
	* Communication & Availability : Between 330 and 630 Monday through Thursday. Any time on Friday 
Applicant : Goodwin, Elaine
School (district) : Alturas Interational academy  (Forester 495)
Role(s) : Upper Elementary Teacher (3rd+);
LinkedIn Profile : 

INTERESTS
Why they want to be a part of this program:
	* My hope in entering this program is to increase my knowledge in STEM. This will allow me to incorporate more stem into my classroom and maybe even into our school. It was be so fun and beneficial for our students if I were able to start a stem club.
STEM fields they are particularly interested in learning more about:
	* Life Science / Biology
	* Earth & Environmental Science
	* Computer Science (e.g., coding, programming languages, software/app development, etc.) 
	* Information & Communication Technology (e.g. networking, data management, building/troubleshooting computer systems, etc.)
	* Agriculture, Food, Natural Resources

EXPERIENCE
Grade Levels: 
	* 1
	* 2
	* 3
	* 4
	* 5
	* 6
	* Pre K



STEM Domain Experience
	* No specific STEM domain experience

Business software & skills:
	* Presentation Software (MS Powerpoint or Google Slides)	* 
Instructional work they are open to during externship:
Elementary teaching : Yes
Secondary Teaching : No
Adult Teaching : No
Camp counselor : Yes
Curriculum design : Yes
Externship durations they are available for:
Other interesting experience:

STEM fields they are particularly interested in learning more about:
	* Life Science / Biology
	* Earth & Environmental Science
	* Computer Science (e.g., coding, programming languages, software/app development, etc.) 
	* Information & Communication Technology (e.g. networking, data management, building/troubleshooting computer systems, etc.)
	* Agriculture, Food, Natural Resources

EXPERIENCE
Grade Levels: 
	* 1
	* 2
	* 3
	* 4
	* 5
	* 6
	* Pre K



STEM Domain Experience
	* No specific STEM domain experience

Business software & skills:
	* Presentation Software (MS Powerpoint or Google Slides)	* 
Instructional work they are open to during externship:
Elementary teaching : Yes
Secondary Teaching : No
Adult Teaching : No
Camp counselor : Yes
Curriculum design : Yes
Externship durations they are available for:
Other interesting experience:


LOGISTICS
Residence : Idaho falls 
Open to:
	* In-Person	* Remote	* Hybrid	* 


CONTACT
	* Primary Email : Ezgood2010@gmail.com
	* Secondary Email : Elaine.goodwin@alturasacademy.org
	* Phone : 2085341037
	* Communication & Availability : Between 330 and 630 Monday through Thursday. Any time on Friday 
Applicant : Goodwin, Elaine
School (district) : Alturas Interational academy  (Forester 495)
Role(s) : Upper Elementary Teacher (3rd+);
LinkedIn Profile : 

INTERESTS
Why they want to be a part of this program:
	* My hope in entering this program is to increase my knowledge in STEM. This will allow me to incorporate more stem into my classroom and maybe even into our school. It was be so fun and beneficial for our students if I were able to start a stem club.
STEM fields they are particularly interested in learning more about:
	* Life Science / Biology
	* Earth & Environmental Science
	* Computer Science (e.g., coding, programming languages, software/app development, etc.) 
	* Information & Communication Technology (e.g. networking, data management, building/troubleshooting computer systems, etc.)
	* Agriculture, Food, Natural Resources
